pr_title: Retry follow task when remote connection queue full

timeline.message: Retry follow task when remote connection queue full

timeline.bodyText: I don't think there was a lot of thought to the connection listener limit. If there is a strong reason to increase it past 100 we could probably do that. Also does does this name make sense? We only allow a single connection round at a time. Should the name be cluster.remote.max_pending_connection_listeners?
timeline.author: tbrooks8

replies.bodyText:
Should the name be cluster.remote.max_pending_connection_listeners?

++. I renamed it in f9c807f.

I don't think there was a lot of thought to the connection listener limit. If there is a strong reason to increase it past 100 we could probably do that.

Yeah, I think we chose this value quite arbitrarily. I think it's fine to increase this value as we should not have many concurrent remote searches, and CCR will retry on this error anyway. I've increased this to 1000. WDYT?
replies.author: dnhatn
